cases.topic: Impact of generative AI on course design quality
cases.prompt: Write a Research Report for undergraduate student on topic 'Impact of generative AI on course design quality'. Requirements: Use section headers: Background, Current State, Recommendations, Conclusion. Keep the text practical and executable.

Write a Research Report for graduate student on topic 'Learning engagement in hybrid classrooms'. Requirements: Include a Markdown risk-mitigation table with at least 3 rows and a Priority section. Keep the text practical and executable.

Write a Research Report for teaching assistant on topic 'Fairness evaluation for auto-grading labs'. Requirements: Start with a Style Guide section: title SimHei size 16pt, body SimSun size 12pt, line spacing 28pt. Keep the text practical and executable.

Write a Research Report for junior lecturer on topic 'Citation verification workflow improvement'. Requirements: Use short sentences for low reading burden and add a Key Takeaway line after each section. Keep the text practical and executable.
